item.description:
Dinner after Welcoming the Troops Home.
Monday Aug. 30th.
anytime after 7 pm.
The Olive Garden
2048 Woodbury Avenue
Newington, NH 03801
(603) 436-8400

Host: Steve O. 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net
Call for info. about Carpooling from Nashua and Manchester NH.

Please join us just for dinner, or before hand to welcome the troops home. We had 10 people join us for dinner at the Olive Garden last time we welcome our troops home. We know everyone can't take the time off to get to the airport in time to welcome them and shake the hands of our returning troops . They are here for only an hour or two. Before they fly off again to their homes and bases throughout our country. So, come an have a meal with us as we talk and meet some new and old members.
Please RSVP ASAP for diinner. So, Steve o can pt our reservation in.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Dinner after Welcoming the Troops Home.
